69b8qlJ1at-U7KgnhyNnhw.text: I was really in the mood for some fish and chips, but I live just far enough from the nearest chippy to make it unreasonable to walk, as the food would be cold by the time I got home. For this reason, I was delighted to find Stefano's could be ordered from online. The menu selection is good and the prices are decent too, as is the free delivery! I ordered my fish supper and was given an estimated delivery time of 35 minutes from order- fine, I thought. However, after paying, the time suddenly changed to an hour after ordering, and I was quite annoyed. Indeed, the hour time provided turned out to be accurate, and I sat waiting for my food for far too long. When it eventually arrived, the food tasted fine. The chips were very good, the fish only okay. I ate it all, of course, but it just wasn't worth the hour wait.  Maybe a fresh fish supper picked up from Stefano's would be great, but overall, I don't recommend ordering from here for delivery.

j6Memd3msvVUBQ97qieh9Q.text: Pizza had long black hair in it. They assumed I was lying and said 'we hear it all the time' which is concerning... they hung up on me. Also said same to just eat customer services and so they had to refund me on their behalf. Shocking hygiene and shocking service.

zVXGH0Zi_0pQgFjjwT5cNg.text: I don't often eat from here, but on the occasions that I do I always end up sick! You'd think I'd have learnt by now - wouldn't you?! Clearly not. Best head 5 minutes up the road and go to the Comiston Fry.
